message:
{
    "name": "Lu-Mei-Pope Metric in Higher Dimensions",
    "abbrev": "LMPMetric",
    "description": "A higher-dimensional generalization of the Lu-Mei-Pope metric, applicable to theories with extra dimensions. This metric provides a framework for studying gravitational interactions in such theories.",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,
    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Cartesian",
            "xlineElement": "ds² = -(1 - 2 \* M / (r^2 + a^2)) \* dt^2 + (r^2 + a^2) / (r^2 + a^2 - 2 \* M) \* dr^2 + r^2 \* (dθ^2 + sin^2 θ \* dφ^2)",
            "validated": false
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"]
}[0m
